snippet: Wal-Mart's takeover of Massmart cleared a major hurdle on Friday, when an antitrust court in South Africa rejected the government's bid to scuttle the $2.4 billion deal.
abstract: Wal-Mart's takeover of Massmart cleared a major hurdle on Friday, when an antitrust court in South Africa rejected the government's bid to scuttle the $2.4 billion deal.

headline.main: Wal-Mart's Bid for Massmart Wins Court Approval
